name: Cheater Philly Cheesesteak
description: Shave grocery expenses and skip the pricey steak—this sandwich tastes just as delish with 1 lb of ground beef, which costs about half as much as a single $12 steak.
preparation: Preheat oven 400° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Thinly slice peppers and onion; place in a large bowl. Add mushrooms, oil, and seasoning, lightly toss to mix. Crumble in beef; using a fork, gently combine.
Arrange in a single layer on pan as best you can. Roast for 8–10 min.
Remove from oven and sprinkle with cheese. Place back in oven and roast 2 min or until cheese melts.
tips: Try this recipe with ground chicken, turkey, or pork. Think thrifty and get the protein that’s on sale!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens and 1 tbsp Epicure salad dressing.
